Items.Note: Ability to move cards between boards and lists while viewing a card.  Simply click on the board / list name when viewing a card to change it.
Ability to update membership on a card.
Card data now correctly updates on the card list screen after modifying it.
When entering description text, the textbox will now autoscroll itself as text becomes hidden by the on screen keyboard.
Drag & Drop for moving cards between lists on the same board.  Simply tap and hold a card to initiate move mode.  Then, slide to the left / right for moving lists, or up / down for re-prioritizing
